name: A Wizard in Nagsel
description:
Hey folks!

Set your browser to fullscreen and double click the text box, then click outside the box to play. (Still learning this whole "upload your game" thing). The box will update throughout the game with new information.

This is my first game and was originally created for a class project. The game is set in the countryside of Nagsel where a sudden and inexplicable undead rise has occurred. Magic has also been rendered obsolete by an unknown entity. The player must gather the Staff of Dimensions and return it to a safe location. Unfortunately, the player is also a wizard who cannot use their magic abilities and must rely on their quick reflexes to avoid the zombies and collect the Staff of Dimensions before they are swarmed.

Enjoy!
